mapper.select: select NOTICE_NO noticeNo, NOTICE_SUB noticeSub,NOTICE_CON noticeCon, NOTICE_DATE noticeDate, NOTICE_KIND noticeKind, NOTICE_FILE, NOTICE_COUNT noticeCount, EMPLOYEE_ID employeeId from notice where notice_no= #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into notice(NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_SUB,NOTICE_CON, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_KIND, NOTICE_FILE, NOTICE_COUNT, EMPLOYEE_ID) values((),#{noticeSub}, #{noticeCon},sysdate,#{noticeKind}, null, 0 ,#{employeeId})
